title: I Bet I Can
description: I Bet I Can is about a bear that attempts to overcome a variety of obstacles. Unfortunately, he doesn't achieve any of the goals he sets for himself until the end of the book.
reviewWords: grabbed, hawk, kangaroo, snap, splash, splat
awareness: Discriminate Medial Sounds                : Discriminate medial short vowel sounds
phonics: Consonant Blends                : Recognize final blends in words
grammar: Past-Tense Verbs                : Recognize and understand that some verbs can be changed to past tense by adding the -ed suffix
wordWork: Onomatopoeia                : Identify and understand the use of onomatopoeia
